titleStmt.title: Seuen dayes conference betweene a catholicke christian, and a catholicke Romane. Concerning some controuersies of religion. By William Cowper, B. of Galloway.
titleStmt.author: Cowper, William, 1568-1619.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W. S[tansby] for Iohn Budge, and are to be sold at his shop at the South doore of Paules, and Britaines Bursse,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
